statement.p: Out of the last 43 days, it rained 20 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{20}}{{43}}={0.46511627906977}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.46511627906977}={46.511627906977} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 46.51 .
